item.title: Ftp读取文件到BytesIO缓存读文件
item.description: 从ftp服务器读文件到内存不在客户端生成本地文件 def openFtpFileBytesIO(fileName,ftpServer,ftpUser='anonymous',ftpPass='',port=21): """ 读ftp文件到缓存 """ ftps = FTP() ftps.connect(ftpServer,port) ftps.login(ftpUser,ftpPass) download_file = BytesIO() ftps.retrbinary('RETR ' + str(fileName), download_file.write) download_file.seek(0) return download_file def readFile(f): while True: line = f.readline() if line: print(line) else: f.close() break if __name__=="__main__": f=openFtpFileBytesIO('test.csv','192.168.0.3') readFile(f)
